data.title: Songs with a boy's name in the title: A handy list
data.meta_description: There have been many songs over the years dedicated to men or boys, but how many of them have actually got a boy's anme in the title?
data.text:
By Tom Eames

There have been many songs over the years dedicated to men or boys, but how many of them have actually got a boy's anme in the title?

Whether you're looking for a song dedicated to a certain someone (or yourself), or simply need to complete the latest 30-Day Song Challenge, here's a handy list for you all.

And if you're looking for girl's names, head here!

Christopher Cross - 'Arthur's Theme'

Christopher Cross - Arthur's Theme

Dionne Warwick / Cilla Black - 'Alfie'

Dionne Warwick - Alfie

Blink-182 - 'Adam's Song'

blink-182 - Adam's Song

Lady Gaga - 'Alejandro'

Lady Gaga - Alejandro

Brotherhood of Man - 'Angelo'

Brotherhood Of Man - Angelo • TopPop

Jim Croce - 'Bad, Bad, Leroy Brown'

Jim Croce - Bad Bad Leroy Brown (Midnight Special - 1973)

Michael Jackson - 'Ben'

Michael Jackson singing Ben..beatifull!!!!!!

Paper Lace - 'Billy Don't Be a Hero'

Paper Lace - Billy don't be a Hero 1974

Rednex - 'Cotton Eye Joe'

Rednex - Cotton Eye Joe (Official Music Video) [HD] - RednexMusic com

Elton John - 'Daniel'

Elton John - Daniel 1973

Robbie Williams - 'David's Song'

Robbie Williams - David's Song live

Taylor Swift - 'Dear John'

Dear John

Blondie - 'Denis'

Blondie - Denis

ABBA - 'Fernando'

Abba - Fernando

Sister Sledge - 'Frankie'

Sister Sledge - Frankie (TOTP 1985)

Robert Palmer - Johnny and Mary (Official Video)

Jimi Hendrix - 'Hey Joe'

Jimi Hendrix - Hey Joe Monterey Pop Festival 1967

The Beatles - Hey Jude

Hit the road Jack!

Sham 69-Hurry Up Harry

Pearl Jam - Jeremy (Video)

Rick Springfield - Jessie's Girl (Official Video)

Jilted John's First TOTP Appearance

Chuck Berry - Johnny B. Goode (Live 1958)

Fine Young Cannibals - Johnny Come Home

John Leyton - Johnny Remember Me

The Rolling Stones - Jumpin' Jack Flash (Live) - OFFICIAL

The Kingsmen - 'Louie Louie'

Louie Louie The Kingsmen {Stereo}
